<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Affliction Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5912) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 14), [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=242) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
[Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5897)

</column>

---

The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction. Add mercy of recuperation to the types of mercy you can provide, allowing you to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) an affliction instead of an effect causing a condition (typically an affliction is a [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669)).
name: Affliction Mercy
